summary: Five downed pilots must contend with hungry prehistoric beasts and lusty cave women on a lush island paradise.
cast: Ross Hagen|Richard Gabai|Antonia Dorian|Griffin Drew|Michelle Bauer|Peter Spellos|Tom Shell|Steve Barkett|Toni Naples|Bob Sheridan|Nikki Fritz|Becky LeBeau|Robin Chaney|Wendy Griffen|Deborah Dutch|Wendy Spahr|Carrie Curtis|Jennifer Klein|Darlene Sellers|Diana Brown|Pam Green|Lisa Biossat|Sheri Hicks|Julie Baltay|Christopher Wooden|Solly Assa
director: Directors: Fred Olen Ray, Jim Wynorski
title: La isla de los dinosaurios
